titleStmt.title: The Duke of Saxonie his iubilee with a short chronologie. Both shewing the goodnesse of God, in blessing the Gospel of Christ, since Luther first opposed the Popes pardons.
titleStmt.author: Johann Georg I, Elector of Saxony, 1585-1656. aut
W. S., fl. 1618.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Iones dwelling in Red crosse-streete,

notesStmt.note: "The Duke of Saxonie his iubilee" signed: Iohannes George, Churfurst, that is, Prince Elector.
Proclaiming a celebration of the jubilee of one hundred years since Luther posted his theses--Folger Shakespeare Library Catalog.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
